law.text:
Any person shall be punished as a court-martial may direct who:
Procures his or her own enlistment or appointment in the state military forces by knowingly false representation or deliberate concealment as to his or her qualifications for that enlistment or appointment and receives pay or allowances thereunder; or
Procures his or her own separation from the state military forces by knowingly false representation or deliberate concealment as to his or her eligibility for that separation.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 87, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56. sec. 65.
